content: Block vote for Oct 30th OO on FHIR Call:

Below are items for our next block vote on Oct 30th OO on FHIR call. I have preapplied several of them so you can preview. If you have any questions or would like to pull an item - contact me. For call times and information see the Conference Call Calender

Comment Submitters
•Alexander Henket•Eugene Lubarsky•Jens Villadsen•Julie Evans•Lloyd McKenzie•Michelle Miller•Richard Townley-O'Neill•Rick Geimer•Simone Heckmann
Line Items

  • GF#17385 Extend+Observation+by+adding+transaction+type (Julie Evans) Not Persuasive
  • GF#17798 Minor+clarification (Jens Villadsen) Not Persuasive
  • GF#17244 DiagnosticReport%3A+change+codedDiagnosis+to+diagnosis%5Bx%5D (Rick Geimer) Not Persuasive with Mod
  • GF#17654 Task.instantiatesReference+should+be+instantiatesCanonical (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive
  • GF#17677 SupplyRequest+should+have+deliverTo+search+in+Patient+compartment (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive
  • GF#17717 vital-signs+profile+rule+vs-1+too+strict+and+technical+error (Alexander Henket) Persuasive
  • GF#17783 oxygenSat+Profile+on+Observation+is+broken (Simone Heckmann) Persuasive
  • GF#17789 Observation%3A+more+search+parameters+for+values (Eugene Lubarsky) Persuasive
  • GF#19252 Increase+cardinality+of+DiagnosticReport.category (Michelle Miller) Persuasive
  • GF#19300 Provide+an+example+value+set+for+Task.code (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive
  • GF#19301 Task.performerType+is+inappropriate+binding (Lloyd McKenzie) In Person Persuasive
  • GF#17468 SupplyRequest.identifier+-%3E+0..%2A+and+improve+definition (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive with Mod
  • GF#17571 The+profiles+of+VitalSigns+do+not+have+their+own+names+or+titles (Richard Townley-O'Neill) Persuasive with Mod
  • GF#17636 In+BodyHeight+profile+include+guidance+about+body+length (Richard Townley-O'Neill) Persuasive with Mod
